original: Ingberg, Ragnar August, direktör, Borås, f. 27/11/80 i Länghem, Älvsb. 1., av Joel L o. Mia Lindqvist. G. 1. 15 m. Glara Thorbjörnson, d. 16; 2. 23 m. Svea Magnusson. Barn: Gunhild f. 16, Bo 25, Ruth-Marie 29. — Ge-nöm|g. h. ailillm. ilärov. Anst. h. Carl G. Platin & Co. i Gbg 17, A-B Vin-Se Spritcentr. 17, kont :chef i A-B Gbgssystemet 19, kamr..23, dir. i System A-B i Borås sed. 27. Led. av styr. f. Gbgs Hand :banks avd :kont. i Borås, System A-B i Borås o. Sy-stembol. arb :giv :fören., kontr:deleg. f. v. Sv:e. RVO, ProPatrGM.
translated: Ingberg, Ragnar August, Director, Borås, born on 27/11/80 in Länghem, Älvsb. 1., to Joel L and Mia Lindqvist. He was first married to Glara Thorbjörnson for 15 years until her death in 1916 and later to Svea Magnusson for 23 years. They had three children: Gunhild born in 1916, Bo born in 1925, and Ruth-Marie born in 1929. He completed his studies at a higher commercial school and was employed by Carl G. Platin & Co. in Gothenburg in 1917, A-B Vin-Se Spritcentr. in 1917, and became the manager of A-B Gbgssystemet in 1919, and the head accountant in 1923. He became the director of System A-B in Borås in 1927. He served as a member of the board of directors for Gbgs Hand: banks avd: kont. in Borås, System A-B in Borås and Systebol. He was also a contract delegation member for the military. He was awarded with RVO and ProPatrGM.
